name: Standard Body
description: Standard Body is the default body your ship possess in Nova Drift

name: Assault
description: When you fire your weapon, it has a 8% chance of being empowered 15% improved rate of fire, projectile spread, and projectile velocity. +15% resistance to mobility-reducing effects from your weaponry. -10% maximum shields

name: Spectre
description: You begin to cloak while you are not firing your weapon or moving quickly Up to +250% total weapon damage when you fire while cloaked +1% cloak rate per your level Firing or moving quickly causes this bonus to rapidly diminish
